    • Method Detail

      • setUpClusterMarkers

        private void setUpClusterMarkers()
        Sets up the cluster marker for the different positions. There are a total of 16 cluster markers to initiate for the simple cluster marker algorithm.

      • refreshClusterIconCanvas

        private BitmapDrawable refreshClusterIconCanvas(java.lang.String text)
        Used to create and refresh the cluster icon so that the correct text is written, meaning the number of reports contained within this cluster marker's area
        Parameters:
        text - The number of markers contained within this cluster
        Returns:
        BitampDrawable used as icon for cluster marker object.

      • calculateMarkers

        private boolean calculateMarkers()
        Checks to see of the there is need to cluster markers together if there are more than a 1000 markers within screen view then the calculateCluster() method will be called. Is called for every user interaction with the map
        Returns:
